<title level="1" right="Hazard 6" pfs="">[Phantom Bells](/Hazards.aspx?ID=75)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=16" />
<trait label="Complex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=30" />
<trait label="Haunt" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=88" />
<trait label="Sonic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=147" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn](/Sources.aspx?ID=8) pg. 28</row>

**Complexity** Complex

</column>

The echo of diabolic bells reverberates with a bone-shaking clamor.

---

**Stealth**
+10

**Disable**
[Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) DC 27 (expert) to break the curse with recitations against the power of [Hell](/Planes.aspx?ID=18) (2 actions), or [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) DC 22 (expert) to [Perform](/Actions.aspx?ID=59) an opposing composition

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

**Distant Ringing** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=147)); **Trigger** A living creature approaches within 30 feet. **Effect** Sounds of creaking metal fill the area as the phantom bells begin to swing and the haunt rolls initiative.

---
**Routine**
(1 action) The bells toll, dealing 4d6 sonic damage to each living creature within 30 feet (DC 24 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save).

---
**Reset**
The bells cease ringing if there are no living creatures within 30 feet
name: Phantom Bells
reset: The bells cease ringing if there are no living creatures within 30 feet
